author: hayfasfar
body:
#### PR description:

This merge request introduces a new digitizer for the Cosmic Rack (mini-tracker), along with updates to its geometry and configuration files.

 Main updates
* New digitizer module:Added a dedicated digitizer implementation and configuration for the Cosmic Rack, producing:
    * DIGI collections
    * Cluster and Cluster1D objects
    * Stubs
* Geometry updates:
    * Adjusted the rack rotation to align with CMS global coordinates.
    * Verified and fixed the DetId ordering (now ranked from bottom to top).
* New configuration file:A standalone configuration has been added to run the full digitization chain for the Cosmic Rack.

Next steps
Integration of the new configuration files into the main framework to enable full chain execution with runTheMatrix.py

#### PR validation:

Validation plots can be found in these slides:
 https://indico.cern.ch/event/1605413/contributions/#17-suny

https://indico.cern.ch/event/1610668/#17-suny

All the changes in this PR will go into the following folder:
[Geometry/TrackerCommonData/data/CRack_PhaseII](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/tree/master/Geometry/TrackerCommonData/data/CRack_PhaseII)

@boudoul @bartonaz
title: Geometry updates and digitizer code for the cosmic rack.
